description.paragraph1: Do you have an idea, product, or business that needs a digital presence? I'm here to help you take it to the next level. I specialize in crafting modern interfaces, optimizing user experiences, and leading technical projects with tailored solutions. Each service I offer is designed to deliver real value, align with your goals, and make your project stand out.
description.paragraph2: I am committed to delivering high-quality work that meets your needs and exceeds your expectations. With over 5 years of experience in the industry, I have successfully completed more than 20 projects, and I am dedicated to ensuring that every project I undertake is a success. My goal is to help you achieve your vision and create a digital presence that truly represents your brand.

services.title: Modern Frontend Development
services.description: Design and implementation of responsive, scalable, and user-focused interfaces using React, TypeScript, JavaScript, and TailwindCSS.

services.title: Fullstack Development with PHP + MySQL
services.description: Building complete applications with robust backend, relational databases, and custom admin panels.

services.title: Technical Leadership & CTO
services.description: Technical guidance for startups or small teams, helping define architecture, tools, workflows, and overall tech supervision.
